title: What kind of stylus can I use on an HP Notebook 15 touchscreen laptop that does not support a stylus pen besides the rubber tip stylus? - Quora

response.answer_text: The best you can do is one that looks like a ball point pen that has a plastic nib on the end. A little more comfortable to hold but still wont produce any finer line than the rubber kind. A normal touch screen simply doesn’t have the touch resolution to produce a fine line. The screens that support the electronic type stylus, have a fine mesh metal screen behind the touch screen to detect the position of the stylus.
